name: Copper Quest
description:
Embark on an adventure to defeat the dragon. Gather materials and slay your foes! To defeat the dragon you have to obtain the copper sword, because he is allergic to it. 

Info

The game was made for Miedz Jam in a week. The goal is to find copper and create copper sword then you have to find the dragon which sleeps deep in the caves and defeat him with copper sword.

Tips:

- After healing you have a  cooldown on your potion

- Better ores, require better pickaxes

- Upgraing your sword increases your attack speed and slash size

- Upgrading you pickaxe increases your mining speed

- Go to elevator to unlock it on current floor

- Use pickaxe to destroy chests

- You can't mine the grey blocks

- You can teleport to the side of the screen by going to the side of the other

Controls

AD / - Move Left/Right (When next to the wall you can wall slide)

Space/ W /  - Jump/Double Jump/Wall Jump

F - Heal

E - Inventory

Scroll - Switch Between Pickaxe/Sword

Hold left - Mine/Attack
